com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event

Interface RequestListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonRequestListener, RadioCategoriesRequestListener

    public interface RequestListener
    Callback interface for API requests. Each method includes a 'requestId' parameter that identifies the calling request. It will be set to the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onComplete(java.lang.String response, java.lang.Object requestId)
      Called when a request completes with the given response.
      void onDeezerError(DeezerError exception, java.lang.Object requestId)
      Called if Deezer services refuse the request for any reason (except OAuth, read above).
      void onIOException(java.io.IOException exception, java.lang.Object requestId)
      Called when a request has a network or request error.
      void onMalformedURLException(java.net.MalformedURLException exception, java.lang.Object requestId)
      Called if an invalid request path is provided (which may result in a malformed URL).
      void onOAuthException(OAuthException exception, java.lang.Object requestId)
      Called if Deezer services refuse the request because the token of DeezerConnectInterface is not valid anymore.

    • Method Detail

      • onComplete

        void onComplete(java.lang.String response,
              java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called when a request completes with the given response. If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Parameters:
        response - the json response.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

      • onIOException

        void onIOException(java.io.IOException exception,
                 java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called when a request has a network or request error. If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that occured.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

      • onMalformedURLException

        void onMalformedURLException(java.net.MalformedURLException exception,
                           java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called if an invalid request path is provided (which may result in a malformed URL). If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that occured.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

      • onOAuthException

        void onOAuthException(OAuthException exception,
                    java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called if Deezer services refuse the request because the token of DeezerConnectInterface is not valid anymore. In this case, try to reconnect. If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that occured.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

      • onDeezerError

        void onDeezerError(DeezerError exception,
                 java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called if Deezer services refuse the request for any reason (except OAuth, read above). If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Parameters:
        exception - the exception that occured.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask
